import React from 'react' import { ListGroup, Card, Col,Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import moment from 'moment'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import Reactions from '../components/Reactions' function Posts({ post }) { return (
{post.title}
{post.description}
{post.likes.map((like) => ( ))}

{post.createdAt.substring(0,10)} ({moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()})

) } export default Posts
